arcade.core.env.operation

Interface Operation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PatchOperation, PatchOperationDiffuser, PatchOperationDiffuserRect, PatchOperationDiffuserTri, PatchOperationGenerator

    public interface Operation
    An Operation object is a non-exclusive environmental layer steppable.

    Operation objects represent environmental behaviors or mechanisms within a Lattice object, such as diffusion. The Operation should be called during the step method of the corresponding Lattice object. An Operation can be implemented with different versions; the specific class can be selected when instantiating the Lattice object.

    More than one Operation can be active for a given Lattice object.

    Operation objects are analogs to Process for steppables that affect the environment.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void step(ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random, Simulation sim)
      Performs the actions of the process during the Lattice step.
